### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE student_info (
    student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    grade INT,
    attendance_record TEXT
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE student_info SET grade = 10 WHERE student_id = 1;

CREATE TABLE student_info (
    student_id INT PRIMARY KEY,

)

### STATEMENT
